## Overview

MediumButton web component

<medium-button />

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute  | Description            | Type      | Default |
| ------------ | ---------- | ---------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `isDisabled` | `disabled` | Enables disabled state | `boolean` | `false` |
| `isLoading`  | `loading`  | Enables loading effect | `boolean` | `false` |
